definitions.definition: A system of rules and principles for the structure of a language , or of languages in general.

subdefinitions.definition: The study of such a system.

definitions.definition: Actual or presumed prescriptive notions about the correct use of a language.
A book describing the grammar ( sense 1 or sense 2 ) of a language.
A formal system specifying the syntax of a language.
A formal system defining a formal language .
The basic rules or principles of a field of knowledge or a particular skill .
A book describing these rules or principles ; a textbook .
A set of component patterns , along with the rules for connecting them, which can be combined to form more complex patterns such as large still lifes , oscillators , and spaceships .

main_definition: ( linguistics ) A system of rules and principles for the structure of a language , or of languages in general.
secondary_definitions: Actual or presumed prescriptive notions about the correct use of a language.
A book describing the grammar ( sense 1 or sense 2 ) of a language.
( Can we verify this sense?) ( computing theory ) A formal system specifying the syntax of a language.
( computing theory ) A formal system defining a formal language .
( figurative ) The basic rules or principles of a field of knowledge or a particular skill .
( British , archaic ) A book describing these rules or principles ; a textbook .

( cellular automata ) A set of component patterns , along with the rules for connecting them, which can be combined to form more complex patterns such as large still lifes , oscillators , and spaceships .
